scripts.clean: npm run clean:main && npm run clean:app && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.test: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:build && npm run test:start
scripts.test:coveralls: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:build && npm run test:start -- --coverageReporters=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test:html: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:build && npm run test:start -- --coverageReporters=html
scripts.test:prepare: npm install && npm run test:prepare:main && npm run test:prepare:app
scripts.test:build: npm run test:build:main && npm run test:build:app
scripts.test:build:main: cd ./MetaDataTransformer/ && npm run test:build && npm run test:build:post
scripts.test:build:app: cd ./MetaDataTransformerUsage/ && npm run test:build && npm run test:build:post
